description.de-DE: Offizielles CleverPush Shopware Plugin. Erweitert Shopware um eine Integration von CleverPush mithilfe eines Service Workers. Die Channel ID kann im Adminbereich gesetzt werden.
description.en-GB: Official CleverPush Shopware extension. Extends Shopware with an integration of CleverPush via a Service Worker. The Channel ID can be set in the Admin area.

scripts.check: docker pull shopware/shopware-cli:latest && docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/ext shopware/shopware-cli:latest extension validate --full /ext
scripts.format: docker pull shopware/shopware-cli:latest && docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/ext shopware/shopware-cli:latest extension format /ext
